# Introduction

For example, you can make enlarge-able plots.

```{r}
library(rmdpartials)
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- x + rnorm(100) + 0.5 * x^2

enlarge_plot(ggplot2::qplot(x, y), plot_name = "myplot")
```
